solution_line_template: Joey will earn {num_lawns} * ${price_per_lawn} = $<<{num_lawns}*{price_per_lawn}={earnings_lawns}>>{earnings_lawns} mowing his neighbors’ lawns.
He will earn {num_figures} * ${price_per_figure} = $<<{num_figures}*{price_per_figure}={earnings_figures}>>{earnings_figures} selling his collectable figures.
He will earn {hours_worked} * ${hourly_rate} = $<<{hours_worked}*{hourly_rate}={earnings_job}>>{earnings_job} at his after-school job.
